__e: Well, I think that any business could benefit from a set of fresh eyes, and my research tells me that you have the only, um...
It's obvious to us that you are the brains behind this little outfit and that only you know where the money is.
It might not be what you had in mind, but it means we can open as a business and stand a chance of making a good go of things.
Not with all the money that I've had to put into.... Into your fancy clothes and your make-up, so you could fit into this "Champagne Society."
My daughter think she's to good to work for your business.
I was thinking, until we figure out what it is that we could do as a "family business," you know I have got a little situation I could use a little help with.
But since the city isn't actually putting any money into this endeavor, it seems to me I have no real reason to take orders about who I can or can't hire.
Because if the business doesn't work out, It'll be my fault you have nothing.
You're not going with your father.
I'm coming along on this endeavor whether you like it or not.
This is the sort of endeavor I've been looking for.
My father taught me to give the very best to every endeavor I undertook.
